question.body: Which of the following does not define the oral cavity?

response.feedback: Incorrect. The cheeks make up the oral cavityâ€™s lateral walls.
Incorrect. The tongue makes up the floor of the oral cavity.
Correct. The uvula is a cone shaped muscular process that hangs down from the soft palate. The soft palate creates part of the anterior boarder of the oral cavity.
Incorrect. The Hard palate creates part of the anterior boarder of the oral cavity.
